marklogic.body:
Did they have a dry cleaner on hand to clean all the blood his clothes to? As anyone who has ever had any kind of cut on their head knows, any head injury Bleeds like crazy. There were no bandages on Zimmermans head. Not even a bandaid. And he climbed out of the back of a police car in handcuffs without any assistance. If you have ever been arrested you know how difficult it is to exit the rear seat of a police car in handcuffs. In most cases the cops give you a hand getting out and also make sure you don't hit your head on the way out.
Especially if you are injured or have a head injury. Get real people. Zimmerman shot Trevon in Cold Blood. This will become clear later on. The fact that they didn't arrest Zimmerman right the bat is a mystery that will also see the light Off day.
Â And all you bigoted folks will have to pack up your prejudices for another day in knuckle dragger land.
